title: Magicka
description: Magicka, a force not seen around Deeplake for hundreds of years, is about to return…Life in Deeplake is so dull for Lily Golding that she goes to elaborate lengths to keep herself entertained. Whilst out on a school trip one day, she plays a practical joke on her teacher, only to see the joke rebound in surprising circumstances. And moments later, when a flaming meteor tears through the sky and crashes into town, Lily and her friends realise things may be awakening in Deeplake – things that have been asleep for a very long time.Magicka (Part 1) is the first part in a series of instalments telling the story of Lily Golding and the rise of Magicka.
author: Daniel Patrick
